com.wove

Class GameController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.wove.GameController

  • public class GameController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class starts and runs the game of blackjack. To use it, instantiate GameController and call startGame()

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private Dealer dealer
      representation of the dealer at a blackjack table
      private boolean gameDone
      gameDone determines if the user would no longer like to use this application
      private java.util.List<Player> players
      List of players playing the game.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GameController()
      Creates an instance of GameController that can be run

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private void dealerDraws()
      Has the dealer draw his cards one by one updating the screen each time
      private java.util.Set<PlayerAction> getAvailableActions(Hand hand, Player player)
      gets the available actions to a player on a given turn.
      private boolean handleDealerHasBlackjack()
      collects money of players without blackjack and returns money to players with blackjack.

      have the dealer hand out the cards one by one and updates the screen for every new card.

      Initializes a game of blackjack welcomes and determines the number of people playing and shuffles the deck

      pay players who have a blackjack.

      Performs the action the player requested or asks the dealer to do so.

      Starts the whole game

      • handleDealerHasBlackjack

        private boolean handleDealerHasBlackjack()
        collects money of players without blackjack and returns money to players with blackjack. Then explain what happened and print out updated moneys.
        Returns:
